text: Bill Schultz may refer to: *Bill Schultz (American football) (born 1967), American retired football player *Bill Schultz (producer) (born 1960), American television producer *Bill Schultz (Fender) (1926–2006), former CEO of Fender Musical Instruments Corporation *Bill Schultz (Australian rugby league player) (1891–1975), Australian rugby league footballer *Bill Schultz (New Zealand rugby league player) (died 2015), New Zealand rugby league footballer *William L. Schultz (1923-2009), American circus performer, teacher, and writer *Captain Willy Schultz, a comic book character ==See also== *William Schulz (disambiguation)
title: Bill Schultz
